page.description: Packs the records in the tables of a set. Prompt for tablenames if silent if .f.

argument.name: setname
argument.description: The name of the set whose dictionaries you wish to pack.

page.discussion: The A5_PACK_SET() function displays the Pack Set dialog. After you select the tables in the set that you wish to pack and click OK, the function permanently removes any deleted files in the selected tables.
